intro: Impatiens gongshanensis, commonly known as Gongshan impatiens, is a species of flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Balsaminaceae and is characterized by its striking, showy flowers that typically come in shades of red, pink, and white. The plant is herbaceous, with opposite leaves that are usually ovate or elliptic in shape. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endemic species.
